scripts.bundle: mkdir -p bundle_out && env LV_BINDINGS_COMMIT_HASH=$(git -C ../../lib/lv_bindings rev-parse HEAD) parcel build frontend.html -o index.html -d parcel_bundle_out --no-source-maps --public-url ./ && mv parcel_bundle_out/* bundle_out && cp docs/wasm_file_api.js lvgl.html bundle_out/ && rm -rf parcel_bundle_out
scripts.dev: env LV_BINDINGS_COMMIT_HASH=$(git -C ../../lib/lv_bindings rev-parse HEAD) parcel watch frontend.html -o index.html -d bundle_out --no-source-maps --public-url ./
